definitions.definition: Any of a large group of aquatic amoeboid protists of the subphylum Foraminifera , characterized by streaming granular ectoplasm that among other things is used for catching food , often with a calcareous shell with many holes through which pseudopodia protrude .

main_definition: Any of a large group of aquatic amoeboid protists of the subphylum Foraminifera , characterized by streaming granular ectoplasm that among other things is used for catching food , often with a calcareous shell with many holes through which pseudopodia protrude .
